sentences.sContent: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.sCn: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

sentences.sContent: ...Students apply to the program directly through their schools...
...one has to wonder why don’t we apply the same social norms to checking phones during meals...
...learning cost will be so largely decreased that people can afford to apply for more courses they are interested in...
...Many examples show the basic laws of imperial capitalism no longer apply in present-day America...
...The dynamics of the imperial capitalism of the 19th century needn't apply in the democracies of the 21st...
...it is by practice that we can apply the knowledge we have obtained from our textbooks to solving practical problems...
...or you can approach alongside and slowly apply pressure to gradually alter his course...
...have them apply to these schools at greater frequency and ultimately get in and enroll...

phrases.pCn: 减少对…之消耗量；努力，致力于…
立即应用；马上申请；在线申请

words.tran: 应用；实施（apply的过去分词）；敷上

trans.tranCn: 应用，实施，使用；适用；申请，请求
trans.tranOther: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something
to put or spread something such as paint, liquid, or medicine onto a surface
